originalText.text: Their management is not trustworthy whatsoever, simply looking to make a fast buck, with little concern about delivering what they promise. A mistake in testing by them wiped our online store's entire category data, leading to months of clean up and many thousands of dollars in lost sales. On top of that, Pimberly management did everything they could to shift blame and, when that failed, they left us high and dry, going radio silent and providing no help whatsoever in cleaning up the disaster they caused. If you want a PIM you can trust and rely on, I beg you to look elsewhere. We wasted 2 years with these clowns and, after firing a torpedo into our store, they then thought it best to suggest parting ways and keep the bulk of the money we paid. Please spare yourself from experiencing our nightmare, look at other PIM options instead.

originalText.text: As an agency deeply entrenched in the world of ecommerce, Calashock has had the privilege of working with numerous product information management (PIM) platforms over the years. However, we must say that my experience with the Pimberly PIM platform has been nothing short of extraordinary. It's a game-changer that has elevated our clients' digital commerce strategies to new heights. Their team is also great to work with, both for Merchants and for Agency Partners!

originalText.text: My company used this software and it was a total mess. The tool is full of bugs and they don't care about their customers. NOTE TO MANAGEMENT - hire a customer service team and fix your product before trying to sell it

originalText.text:
Horrible application and company. They lie about the technical capabilities and their software did more harm than good to our store.

DO NOT USE THIS APP or trust a single thing this company says.

Total waste of time and money.
